name: Invasion Of The Pobs
description:
A top-down shooter game where you must eliminate the alien threat with a bunch of cool weapons and rescue imprisoned survivors.

Be In The Credits

If you record yourself playing this game (preferably commentating), and upload the video to YouTube, you will be included in the final game's credits as a Game Tester.

Controls

Move: WASD
Aim: Mouse
Fire: Left Mouse Click

Switch Weapon: Right Mouse Click

Action Key: E
Dev console: BACKSPACE ( good luck finding the cheats ;-] )
Pause: ESCAPE
(Full controller support is coming)
